Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and KL Rahul put on 165 for the fourth wicket
Ravindra Jadeja took 3-28 with the ball
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli ran down the target with 8.4 overs to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Australia captain Pat Cummins said it's not ideal to drop someone of Virat Kohli's calibre
Cummins also said that with another 50 on the board, the bowling innings looks a little bit different
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a slow wicket that offered plenty for the turners
Australia's spinners couldn't get anywhere near the same purchase in dewy conditions
Australia's spin stocks are limited with Adam Zampa the only front-line option in the squad
Others: The match was played at Chennai's MA Chidambaram Stadium
